layman_description: A decorated bookshelf with books stored on bottom and top sections for displaying your library.
technical_description: This bookshelf extends the base model with custom icon tinting and a specific sort order value.
player_impact: Provides extra shelf space to store and show off your book inventory while decorating your settlement.

layman_description: A special bookshelf variant used for placing random book collections during level design.
technical_description: Helper block that extends base bookshelf model with tinting and creative mode only availability.
player_impact: Allows level designers to create varied bookshelf arrangements with unpredictable book contents.

layman_description: An empty top-mounted bookshelf section ready to be filled with your favorite reading material.
technical_description: Top-positioned shelving block with model offset and downgrade block properties.
player_impact: Provides space to display books on upper walls of your structures.

layman_description: A full top-mounted bookshelf loaded with books for display above other furniture.
technical_description: Extended bookshelf with tint color mapping and downgrade settings.
player_impact: Shows readers that you're well-educated and gives aesthetic appeal above doorways or counters.

layman_description: An alternate top-mounted bookshelf design with books ready to read from your upper shelving.
technical_description: Variant bookshelf with model offset and visual customization properties.
player_impact: Offers another style option for decorating high-mounted storage in your living spaces.

layman_description: A helper bookshelf for randomly spawning different book selections on top shelves.
technical_description: Development-only block with custom icon tinting for level design.
player_impact: Lets creators design more interesting loot placement without manual item assignment.

layman_description: An empty top-mounted single-width bookshelf ready for your books.
technical_description: Base model bookshelf with extended model properties and no items.
player_impact: Simple and compact shelf for storing reading material in tight spaces.

layman_description: A loaded top-mounted single-width shelf packed with books for easy reading access.
technical_description: Fully stocked bookshelf with downgrade mechanics and visual settings.
player_impact: Provides a complete storage solution for your book inventory in narrow areas.

layman_description: Another top-mounted single-width bookshelf design with books for your library display.
technical_description: Extended bookshelf variant with tint and downgrade block options.
player_impact: Offers style variation for matching different room aesthetics while storing books.

layman_description: A random loot bookshelf helper for level designers creating varied top shelf content.
technical_description: Developer tool block with custom tinting for procedural bookshelf contents.
player_impact: Enables designers to create more dynamic and varied library environments.

layman_description: A corner-positioned wooden bookcase with no books, ready for you to fill it.
technical_description: Beveled corner block using wood material with local UV mapping and specific texture values.
player_impact: Allows you to fill corner spaces with your own book inventory for custom displays.

layman_description: A corner-positioned wooden bookcase loaded with books from a preset loot pool.
technical_description: Loot-enabled corner bookcase with wood material and full texture details.
player_impact: Provides instant corner storage without needing to fill it manually.

layman_description: A corner bookcase helper for placing good-quality random book collections in level design.
technical_description: Developer block with custom icon tinting and filter tags for creative mode placement.
player_impact: Gives designers control over placing well-stocked corner libraries.

layman_description: A corner bookcase helper for placing lower-quality random book collections during design.
technical_description: Development tool extending the good variant with modified sort order.
player_impact: Allows mixed-quality loot placement for more realistic variety in structures.

layman_description: A wooden bookcase with empty shelves waiting for you to add your book inventory.
technical_description: Wood-based bookcase using standard model and local UV mapping.
player_impact: Lets you customize exactly which books display on your shelves.

layman_description: A wooden bookcase already stocked with books for immediate reading and decoration.
technical_description: Loot-enabled wooden bookcase with full model geometry and texture mapping.
player_impact: Provides instant decorative storage for your growing book collection.

layman_description: A bookcase helper for level design that places higher-quality random book selections.
technical_description: Developer tool with custom tinting and filter tag system.
player_impact: Enables designers to create library areas with good-quality readable material.

layman_description: A bookcase helper for design that spawns lower-quality random book collections.
technical_description: Development block extending good variant with different sort order.
player_impact: Provides realistic variation in loot quality across different structures.
